Indian Economy.title: S&P upgrades India’s sovereign rating to BBB, says among ‘best performing economies in the world’
Indian Economy.summary: “India remains among the best performing economies in the world. It staged a remarkable comeback from the pandemic with real GDP growth over fiscal 2022 to fiscal 2024 averaging 8.8 per cent, the highest in Asia-Pacific,” said S&P Global Ratings.

Indian Economy.title: Today in Politics: What will PM Modi’s 12th Independence Day speech focus on?
Indian Economy.summary: In the centrepiece annual event, the PM is expected to lay out his government’s agenda, present its report card, make important policy and programme announcements

Indian Economy.title: Mint Quick Edit | India’s S&P upgrade: Better late than never
Indian Economy.summary: India’s sovereign credit rating has been raised by Standard & Poor’s just as we face trade headwinds. The reasoning is sound, even if it’s a belated nod to the Centre’s public debt control.

Indian Economy.title: Indian economy is in the “pink of health”, assures President Murmu on eve of Independence Day
Indian Economy.summary: President Murmu highlights India's robust economy, national security, and self-reliance push in her Independence Day address.

Indian Economy.title: RBI may open room for further easing in upcoming policy if GDP prints come lower: Report
Indian Economy.summary: RBI may cut rates further if GDP disappoints and US Fed slashes rates, as per HSBC Mutual Fund report.

Stock Market.title: Benchmark indices end six-week slump as S&P upgrade boosts sentiment
Stock Market.summary: Benchmark indices end six-week slump as S&P upgrades India to BBB; tech stocks rally, broader markets lag, rupee steady, gold sideways, markets await global cues.

Stock Market.title: Rupee trades in narrow range against US dollar in early trade
Stock Market.summary: At the interbank foreign exchange market, the rupee opened at 87.48 against the US dollar, then touched 87.39, registering a gain of 8 paise over its previous close
